phrs.translation: 修复的, 义肢的, 假体的, 弥补性的
辅基, 酶活动基, 辅成基, 作用分子团
假肢器官装置, 假肢器官
心内膜炎, 人造瓣膜心内膜炎, 人工瓣膜性心内膜炎, 瓣膜心内膜炎

人工心瓣, 心脏瓣膜修复, 人工心脏瓣膜

sentences.sentence: He has undergone 25 operations and wears a prosthetic leg.
sentences.translation: 他已经做过二十五次手术，现在装了一只假腿。

sentences.sentence: She was born without the lower half of her legs and has worn prosthetic ones all her life.
sentences.translation: 她生来就没有下半截腿，一辈子都戴着假肢。

sentences.sentence: Katy was the first person in the world with two prosthetic legs to take up running as a competitive sport.
sentences.translation: 凯蒂是世界上第一个依靠两条义肢参与跑步竞技的人。
